title: A Missing Body: Episode 201
description:
When she waved goodbye to her daddy at her home in Sussex, she could never have guessed it was the last time she would see her daddy. But since that day in January 2011, her dad has never been found and a man is serving time in prison for his murder.

Just what happened to Gary Hampson?
